Name: Aten
Description: This stela fragment illustrates part of an offering scene for the god Aten. Represented under the arc of the sky, the "Disk", equipped with a uraeus, sends his rays in the direction of Akhenaten. The sovereign is seated before a laden offering table and is presenting two libation vases to his only god. The face and the names of the king, written in two cartouches, have been hammered out.
